original_title: Rock & Roll And The 50's: A Visual Scrapbook
overview: Features a series of programmes made in the USA that include a mix of music clips, news footage, TV ads & movie trailers.  The music clips are by Bill Haley & his Comets performing "Rock Around The Clock" & "Rip It UP," Fats Domino doing "Blueberry HIll," ""Need Your Lovin" and many more!
title: Rock & Roll And The 50's: A Visual Scrapbook
